nodes.text: Seven-Seven Dirgeos, formerly known as Ruas Fastent, was a male human who served as an admiral in the Galactic Empire prior to the Battle of Yavin. A few years before the battle, he was given an honorary discharge and was shoved into an Imperial asylum on Grava. Later he had both his arms removed and became a member of the Brotherhood of Wire and Bone founded by Fyzen Gor.
